name: MilkyBaby
0:
”Alexa, ask Milky Baby to add 3 ounces”
”Alexa, ask Milky Baby what's my status”
”Alexa, ask Milky Baby to add 80 milliliters”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: milky baby
des:
With the Milky Baby Alexa Skill, you can measure how much milk you are feeding your baby daily.
You will also get the last time you feed your baby.

To add milk just say: "add 3 ounces"

To get the status just say: "what's my status", this will sum up the amount of milk of the day and also remind you the last time you feed your baby. For example: "Your baby consumed about 5 ounces today. The last feeding time was at 6:30 pm".

The skill supports ounces (oz) or milliliters (ml)

The skills calculate your timezone based on your device zip code.
If you want to update your timezone just reopen the skill by saying: "Alexa, open Milky Baby"
